item.title: Liberals Are Ashamed Of Hamilton For Being Pro-America, So The Right Should Claim It
item.description: The musical sensation honors the American founders and upholds traditional values, and enjoying it for those reasons would drive leftists crazy.

item.title: Biden Judge Who Blocked Trump’s DEI Orders Worked For Law Firm Stacked With Democrat Partisans
